data.title: Casa Lleo Morera, Barcelona
data.meta_description: Do you want to know the entry ticket price for Casa Lleo Morera? Opening & closing timings, parking options, restaurants nearby or what to see on your visit to Casa Lleo Morera? Click Now to check the details!
data.text:
The Casa Lleo Morera was designed by the famous architect, Lluis Domenech i Montaner. It is part of the "Mansana de la Discordia" (block of discord), along with the Casa Amatller, by Puig i Cadafalch, and the Casa Batllo, by Antoni Gaudi. Commissioned by the Lleo Morera family as a refurbishment of their home in 1905, the building is one of the finest examples of modernista architecture in the city. It is a must visit landmark for architecture enthusiasts who will find the decorative elements and artistic grandeur of the house spectacular.

Casa Lleo Morera Travel Tips

They do not have ticket boxes at the entrance.

Tickets for guided tours are only available online and can be purchased with a credit card.

You can also book your ticket personally at the ticket boxes at Palau de la Virreina.

The Guided Tour last 70 minutes and the Express Tour lasts 30 minutes.

Pictures with flash or recording of videos inside the house are prohibited.

Visitors are not allowed to enter wearing high heel shoes or other footwear that may damage the flooring tiles.

Since it is an old structure there are no elements of accessibility for people with reduced mobility.

Entrance Ticket Details For Casa Lleo Morera

Seniors (+65 years old), Youth (under 25 years old), and People with disability: â‚¬13.50 EUR

Casa Lleo Morera Hours

Guided tours of 30 minutes and 60 minutes are available.

Guided Tour in Catalan: Monday to Saturday, at 12:00 pm and 6:00 pm

Guided Tour in Spanish: Monday to Saturday, at 5:00 pm

Guided Tour in English: Monday to Saturday, at 11:00 am

How to Reach Casa Lleo Morera

Bus: 7, 16, 17, 22, 24 i 28

Metro: Line 3, station Passeig de Gracia

RENFE: Railway station Passeig de Gracia
